original_title: Lady Antebellum Live: On This Winter's Night
overview: This is a great looking concert video that benefits from uniform, relatively "normal" looking stage lighting that doesn't bury the singers and instrumentalists in weird tones. Lady Antebellum's holiday concert at Nashville's Schermerhorn Symphony Center was a special night of music accompanied by a symphony orchestra and their live band.
title: Lady Antebellum Live: On This Winter's Night
